title: Additional Options & Redux

redux.tooltip: Quality of Life changes included with Redux:{0}{0}- New inventory screen{0}- Dash turning{0}- New retranslation and dialogue changes for consistency{0}- Max 60 bombs and 99 arrows{0}- Ice Palace matches GBA layout{0}- Permanent Shovel{0}- A map shortcut between Kakariko Village and Hyrule Castle{0}- Skip Title Screen sequence by pressing Start{0}- Restore censored and unused content{0}- Graphical changes to match original artwork

tooltip: Customize A Link to the Past with Redux and additional options

title: ALttP: Quick Commands
tooltip: Assign up to eight Y-Button items to quick access by holding the L or R buttons and pressing A, B, X or Y{0}With support for redux and additional options

title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Worlds
tooltip: A full-sized ROM hack in a completely new setting, which can be quite difficult

title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel
tooltip: An easier and more vanilla-like balanced version of the Parallel Worlds ROM hack
